name: helong
short_description:
This is my pending order system, the EA through continuous improvement to achieve the winning strategy for everyone to learn!
This EA is a strategy I have a lot of practice, summed up from the successes and failures. Will record my progress in this industry in the years ahead, let us make progress, the specific methods:
My main trading style is depends upon technical indicators and latest world updated news. My trading pairs are GBP / USD [EUR / USD]. Daily I go through the latest news like economical and political updates about my trading pairs. Since 3 year I am having good analyzing power in candle stick formation and market moments. I will try to close my positions with profit only.

summary: pending order system, continuous improvement, in order to achieve。
